title: Weekly Menu Planner
goal: Plan meals efficiently for a week.
prompt:
Plan a weekly menu for {meal_type}. Present in a table format:
Day
Breakfast, lunch, and dinner
Dish name

responses.gpt-5:
| Day       | Meal      | Dish Name                          |
| --------- | --------- | ---------------------------------- |
| Monday    | Breakfast | Vegetable Omelette                 |
|           | Lunch     | Grilled Chicken Salad              |
|           | Dinner    | Spaghetti Bolognese                |
| Tuesday   | Breakfast | Avocado Toast with Poached Egg     |
|           | Lunch     | Quinoa & Chickpea Bowl             |
|           | Dinner    | Lemon Garlic Salmon with Veggies   |
| Wednesday | Breakfast | Greek Yogurt Parfait               |
|           | Lunch     | Turkey Sandwich with Salad         |
|           | Dinner    | Chicken Stir-Fry with Rice         |
| Thursday  | Breakfast | Smoothie Bowl with Fruits          |
|           | Lunch     | Lentil Soup with Whole Grain Bread |
|           | Dinner    | Beef Tacos with Salsa              |
| Friday    | Breakfast | Scrambled Eggs with Spinach        |
|           | Lunch     | Grilled Vegetable Wrap             |
|           | Dinner    | Shrimp Fried Rice                  |
| Saturday  | Breakfast | Pancakes with Berries              |
|           | Lunch     | Chicken Caesar Salad               |
|           | Dinner    | Baked Ziti with Cheese             |
| Sunday    | Breakfast | Breakfast Burrito                  |
|           | Lunch     | Tomato Basil Pasta                 |
|           | Dinner    | Roast Chicken with Potatoes        |
responses.gemini-2.5:
| Day       | Breakfast Dish                         | Lunch Dish                                 | Dinner Dish                                 |
|-----------|---------------------------------------|-------------------------------------------|--------------------------------------------|

| Tuesday   | Scrambled Eggs with Spinach and Feta  | Turkey and Avocado Sandwich on Whole Wheat | Baked Lemon Herb Salmon with Quinoa        |
| Wednesday | Oatmeal with Sliced Banana and Walnuts| Black Bean and Corn Salad with Lime Dressing | Homemade Beef Burger on Whole Wheat Bun  |
| Thursday  | Whole Wheat Toast with Peanut Butter and Chia Seeds | Leftover Black Bean and Corn Salad | Chicken Pesto Pasta with Sun-Dried Tomatoes |
| Friday    | Smoothie (Spinach, Mango, Protein Powder) | Tuna Salad Lettuce Wraps                  | Sheet Pan Chicken Fajitas with Bell Peppers |
| Saturday  | Blueberry Pancakes with Maple Syrup   | Ground Beef and Potato Hash                 | Steak with Roasted Asparagus and Sweet Potato |
| Sunday    | Veggie and Cheese Omelet              | Large Cobb Salad                            | Slow-Cooker Pot Roast with Carrots and Potatoes |
